name: 24 Karat Badge
description: Offer The Kiln a worthy sacrifice.

name: Aeronautics Badge
description: Achieve flight.

name: Alpinist Badge
description: Climb past the ALPINE.

name: Animal Serenading Badge
description: Play the Bugle for a Capybara.

name: Arborist Badge
description: Reach the top of a really big tree.

name: Astronomy Badge
description: Look a little too closely at the blazing sun.

name: Balloon Badge
description: Escape the island without taking fall damage.

name: Beachcomber Badge
description: Climb past the SHORE.

name: Bing Bong Badge
description: Escape the island with Bing Bong.

name: Bookworm Badge
description: Read all of Scoutmaster Myres's journal entries.

name: Bouldering Badge
description: Place 10 Pitons.

name: Clutch Badge
description: Revive 3 scouts in a single expedition.

name: Cooking Badge
description: Cook 20 meals at campfires.

name: Cool Cucumber Badge
description: Climb past the MESA without ever having more than 10% Heat.

name: Daredevil Badge
description: Shoot across the MESA canyon in a Scout Cannon.

name: Emergency Preparedness Badge
description: Heal an unconscious friend with an item to save them from death.

name: Endurance Badge
description: Climb 50m upwards without touching the ground.

name: Esoterica Badge
description: Obtain a mystical item.

name: First Aid Badge
description: Heal your friends for 100 points of Injury in a single expedition.

name: Foraging Badge
description: Eat 5 different berries in one expedition.

name: Gourmand Badge
description: Escape the island after cooking and eating a Half-Coconut, Honeycomb, Yellow Winterberry, and an Egg.

name: Happy Camper Badge
description: Receive 5 Morale Boosts from campfires.

name: High Altitude Badge
description: Climb 5000m in total.

name: Knot Tying Badge
description: Place 100m of rope in a single expedition.

name: Leave No Trace Badge
description: Escape the island without placing anything on the mountain.

name: Lone Wolf Badge
description: Escape the island in a solo expedition.

name: Megaentomology Badge
description: Survive an Antlion attack.

name: Mentorship Badge
description: Have a 1-on-1 with the Scoutmaster.

name: Mycology Badge
description: Eat four different non-toxic mushrooms in a single expedition.

name: Naturalist Badge
description: Escape the island without eating any packaged food.

name: Needlepoint Badge
description: Have a lot of Cactuses stuck to you.

name: Nomad Badge
description: Climb past the MESA.

name: Participation Badge
description: Have a friend escape the island without you.

name: Peak Badge
description: Reach The Peak.

name: Plunderer Badge
description: Open 15 Luggages in a single expedition.

name: Resourcefulness Badge
description: Give in to your hunger.

name: Speed Climber Badge
description: Escape the island in under an hour.

name: Survivalist Badge
description: Escape the island without ever losing consciousness.

name: Toxicology Badge
description: Restore 200 total Poison Poison by using items.

name: Trailblazer Badge
description: Climb past the TROPICS.

name: Ultimate Badge
description: Catch a Flying Disc Flying Disc from 100m away.

name: Volcanology Badge
description: Climb past the CALDERA.
